Microcontroller

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Microcontroller.Component
      • Microcontroller.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Backlight, ServoController

    public abstract class Actor
extends Component
    An actor connected to a microcontroller that can perform a certain action
